meanings.definition: To broadcast on television or radio.
meanings.sent1: The show was aired on TV last night.
meanings.sent2: The radio station aired the new song.
meanings.sent3: They aired the news with a funny twist.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were aired for all to hear.
meanings.sent5: The commercial was aired repeatedly during the game.

meanings.sent3: He aired the room to get rid of the smell.
meanings.sent4: The garden was aired by the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The windows were opened to air out the stuffy room.
